title: How to downgrade Pixel back to Android 9 (from final OTA Android 10)
content:
After upgrading my Pixel 1 to Android 10 i can't really use it anymore and want to downgrade back do pie.

To elaborate more on my problems
Can't make or receive phone calls, the phone is either silent or just crashes and reboots
sometimes it won't boot back up in timely manner
audio doesn't come out. It only works for a while after rebooting
the screen is black for many seconds after unlocking with fingerprint
various other little reliability bugs

I was waiting for couple of weeks for fixes or updates but none are coming. After traveling abroad and nearly staying homeless for a night because the phone couldn't make a phone call to my airbnb host i've had it with this botched version of android and want to rollback.
